name: Thawing Heights
description:
Thawing Heights is a claymation inspired action multiplayer and single player game where you try to survive the blazing snowstorm that is weighing down from above while fighting for higher ground to avoid the freezing sea below.

You find yourself and your entire house in middle of nowhere and to top it off you have giant snow piles weighing down your lawn. Get your water hose and start clearing those snow piles while desperately searching for powerful items hidden in the snow to aide you.

Your primary objective is to stay above the sea because the freezing water will kill you in seconds. Try to find higher ground and use the tilt of the platform to your advantage. You can plan ahead and clear sections of the platform so it is tilted in certain directions. Recommended to play with another player using the local multiplayer, a single player option is also available.

Controls: WASD / ARROWS / GAMEPAD LEFT STICK to move. LEFT MOUSE + MOUSE / GAMEPAD RIGHT SHOULDER + RIGHT STICK to use primary action. E / GAMEPAD LEFT SHOULDER to use alternate action.

Gamepad required for multiplayer matches.

Created by @LiroueZyr for Unreal Spring Jam 2020.
